snippet: A blast alongside a convoy of vehicles used by Yemen’s defense minister came one day after a top operative for Al Qaeda in the country was killed.
abstract: Car bomb explodes in Sana, Yemen, alongside a convoy of vehicles used by Defense Minister Maj Gen Mohammed Nasser Ahmed, killing seven bodyguards and five civilians; Ahmed escapes unharmed; attack comes one day after a top operative of Al Qaeda was killed in what Yemeni officials called an American drone strike.

byline.original: By NASSER ARRABYEE and ALAN COWELL
byline.contributor: Nasser Arrabyee reported from Sana, and Alan Cowell from London.

lead_paragraph: A blast alongside a convoy of vehicles used by Yemen’s defense minister came one day after a top operative for Al Qaeda in the country was killed.

headline.seo: Car Bomb Kills 12 in Yemen, but Targeted Minister Escapes Harm
headline.main: Car Bomb Kills 12 in Yemen, but Targeted Minister Escapes Harm
headline.print_headline: Yemen Car Bomb Kills 12, But Not a Targeted Official
